heading: HB07599
0: AN ACT REQUIRING VEHICLE OWNERS TO SECURE CLEARANCES FIRST FROM THE PNP HIGHWAY PATROL GROUP (HPG) BEFORE THEY COULD BRING THEIR VEHICLES TO DIFFERENT  PARTS OF THE PHILIPPINES ON BOARD SEA VESSELS

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07599
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING VEHICLE OWNERS TO SECURE CLEARANCES FIRST FROM THE PNP HIGHWAY PATROL GROUP (HPG) BEFORE THEY COULD BRING THEIR VEHICLES TO DIFFERENT PARTS OF THE PHILIPPINES ON BOARD SEA VESSELS
